name: Emblazon Crest
source: Knights of the Inner Sea pg. 28
components: S, F (an example of the crest or coat of arms)
text: This spell ensures the subject touched is always able to display her proper crest and coat of arms. Any tabard or tunic worn and any shield carried by the subject while this spell is active can be made to display a coat of arms when the spell is cast. For example, even if the subject picks up a different shield, it still displays the subject’s crest, regardless of the shield’s normal appearance.
components_zh: 姿势、器材 (一个纹章或武器涂层)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 这法术能确保被接触的受术者总是能显示她专属的纹章或徽章。当此法术被施展，并处于法术持续时间时，任何被受术者所穿戴的纹章战袍或是长袍以及任何所装配的盾牌，都可以展示其所属的徽章。举例来说，即使受术者拿起不同的盾牌，它依然展示著受术者的纹章，而非该盾牌的正常外表。
